Class MongoConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Connections.MongoConnection

  • public class MongoConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Christopher Weir - G00309429, Gareth Lynskey - G00312651, Paul Dolan - G00297086, Patrick Griffin - G00314635 MongoConnection handles all the requests to and from the MongoDB database on heroku.
